programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Daya and her friends find their husbands in a police station. Sodhi informs the police that he wanted to bring.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Sodhi helps the police to find two car thieves. The police release Jethalal and his friends from jail. Watch this episode.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Jethalal and his friends return to Gokuldham society from the police station. Tapu Sena arranges breakfast.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Jethalal sees a model in the newspaper who looks like Babita and calls Daya to ask if it is her. Later, he tries to convince Babita to take up modelling full-time.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: A marketing executive relentlessly calls Jethalal to invest in his company. Later, Jethalal receives a call from Babita about the pictures in her phone's memory card.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Jethalal and his friends recreate the scenario in which Dhanraj gave Bhide the gold. However, they do this to convince the police to release Bhide from jail.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Jethalal manages to acquire a modelling contract for Babita. Soon, he asks Taarak how he can get her signature on the document without her knowledge.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Jethalal is successful in getting Babita's signature on the modelling contract and goes to his friend Chunky to give the papers for approval.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Chunky informs Jethalal that the hoarding featuring Babita will be put up the next morning. Meanwhile, Jethalal asks Taarak to accompany him to see it for the first time.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Babita's tobacco hoardings are now everywhere in the city, including Gokuldham.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Nattu Kaka and Bagha help Jethalal cover up Babita's advertisement as soon as possible. However, as the morning approaches, they appear to run out of time.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Babita calls Jethalal during his efforts to remove her tobacco hoardings with Chunky's help. Meanwhile, Bawri sees Babita on a billboard and calls Bagha.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Jethalal and Taarak are ashamed to return to Gokuldham as everyone has seen Babita's hoarding. Moreover, Iyer decides to teach the tobacco company a lesson for using his wife's image like this.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: The Gokuldham residents go to the police to report the tobacco hoardings featuring Babita. Later, Inspector Chalu Pandey takes their complaint and decides to confront the advertiser.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Inspector Pandey arrests Chunky for using Babita's image on tobacco hoardings without permission. Later, Pandey asks Chunky to name his helpers.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Jethalal gets worried that his friendship with Babita is probably ruined. Later, Rita and the owner of the tobacco company make a shocking announcement.

programme.desc: Naraz Pari contacts Bhayankar Pari to inform her that in the absence of Rani Pari all the fairies are planning to attack Bhayanak Lok and save Baalveer.

programme.title: Baalveer Returns
programme.desc: All the fairies come to Bhayanak Lok to rescue Baalveer and all the kids, but this might be a trap laid by Bhayankar Pari.

programme.desc: Uorfi Javed and Manisha Rani grace the show and challenge their respective teams to compete. Later, the judges evaluate Rupsa's performance.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Popatlal is shocked to learn about a new government scheme regarding remarriages and vows to protest against it. He then informs Jethalal and his father about the matter.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Popatlal is over the moon to learn that Pooja is on her way to Mumbai and wants to meet him. He then thanks his lucky stars and begins to envision a future with Pooja.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: An awestruck Popatlal is unable to contain his happiness when he gets close to Pooja. Later, he spends some quality time with her.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Popatlal happily receives the parcel of beauty products he had ordered for Pooja to impress her. Later, he becomes curious and opens the box to find mangoes inside it.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Popatlal is thrilled as a delivery boy arrives to deliver the parcel he had ordered for Pooja. However, he refuses to do so until Popatlal returns his box of mangoes.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: After giving it some long and hard thought, Popatlal realises that Taarak Mehta has stolen the box of mangoes. He then barges into Taarak Mehta's house along with Sodhi to search for the mangoes.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Jethalal finds himself in a spot of bother as Popatlal confronts him about stealing his box of mangoes. However, Jethalal manages to turn the tables on Popatlal.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Popatlal calls the police to Gokuldham and seeks their help to find his box of mangoes. However, the residents continue to protest their innocence.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: The police ask Popatlal to compensate the delivery boy for the missing box of mangoes. However, the residents of Gokuldham and the police are left in a lurch when Popatlal refuses to do so.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Popatlal is elated when he finds the parcel and gets the opportunity to meet Pooja. However, Inspector Pandey takes Popatlal to task for wasting his time.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Popatlal and Pooja head out on a romantic date where they spend some quality time together. Later, Pooja decides to confess her feelings for Popatlal in Gokuldham.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Dr Hathi and his family decide to go for lunch at the new restaurant. However, their family time is interrupted when a tree falls on Dr Hathi.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: When Dr Hathi gets stuck beneath a tree, his brothers and the society members rush to the restaurant and try to help him.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: While waiting for the fire brigade, Dr Hathi's brothers try to lift the tree.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: After everyone tries their best but fails, Babita comes up with a brilliant solution and shares it with the members.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: After Babita's plan to help Dr Hathi fails, Natu Kaka and Bagha bring an axe to chop the tree, but the ladies of a campaign warn everyone not to do such things.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Everyone is thankful when a few military men arrive and help Dr Hathi from the tree, but Dr Hathi cannot get up due to his back pain.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: All members of the society are shocked when the police arrest Popatlal for cutting down the tree after the campaign ladies file the case against him, and Popatlal tries to defend himself.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: The people of Gokuldham Society are shocked when the police take Popatlal away for cutting down a tree.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Gokuldham Society's members successfully prove Popatlal's innocence. The police arrest the restaurant manager.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: After the door of the society breaks, the members try to fix it using gum. Champaklal gets stuck to the door and the others try to save him.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Sodhi breaks the society office's door while trying to open it. Babu Chipke brings a glue that can fix just about anything.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Champaklal moves to catch a ball and accidentally steps on a bit of glue. He reveals he is stuck and cannot move.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: The Gokuldham Society members put their heads together to help free Champaklal. However, their plans fail, leaving Champaklal stressed about his situation.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: As Champaklal finds himself glued to the door, the residents of Gokuldham take turns to try and help him out. Jethalal slams Popatlal for adding to Champaklal's problems.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: After New Year celebrations, when Jethalal arrives at Gada Electronics, he is shocked to find Bagha and Nattu Kaka fast asleep outside the godown in an inebriated state.

programme.desc: Amidst divine challenges, Lord Shiva and Parvati, along with their sons Ganesha and Kartikeya, explore the dynamics of love, sacrifice, and family bonds.

programme.title: Itti Si Khushi
programme.desc: Anvita holds Virat accountable for Suhas's deteriorating state. Subsequently, she joins forces with her siblings to persuade Suhas to enter a rehabilitation centre.

programme.title: Itti Si Khushi
programme.desc: Suhas hires Anvita for his café. But problems arise as Virat plans to demolish the café and brings a bulldozer to do it.

programme.title: Itti Si Khushi
programme.desc: Anvita shoulders the responsibility of caring for her five younger siblings. As she navigates her family duties, she also strives to balancer her emotional turmoils.

programme.title: Itti Si Khushi
programme.desc: Anvita forcibly takes Suhas to a rehabilitation center to address his alcohol addiction. Meanwhile, Sanjay plots to frame Virat for the entire cafe robbery.

programme.title: Itti Si Khushi
programme.desc: Anvita holds Virat accountable for Suhas's deteriorating state. Subsequently, she joins forces with her siblings to persuade Suhas to enter a rehabilitation centre.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: The residents of Gokuldham notice Nattu Kaka and Bagha's protest on the news. When Champaklal sees this, he contacts Jethalal and tells him that he should have increased their salaries.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Nattu Kaka and Bagha succeed in convincing Jethalal to raise their salaries. However, they later hear from Bhura that his boss fired him.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Goddess Lakshmi comes to Jethalal in a dream and tells him to preserve his wealth; Popatlal asks Jethalal for notes of higher denominations.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Goddess Lakshmi comes to Jethalal in a dream and tells him to preserve his wealth; Popatlal asks Jethalal for notes of higher denominations.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Bagha and Nattu Kaka inform Jethalal that Naresh is supplying new television sets. However, when Jethalal calls him, he demands INR 50 lakh for one order.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: The residents of Gokuldham learn that currency of higher denominations will be banned. Jethalal and his friends immediately ask their wives to collect all the paper money in their houses.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Jethalal comes to know that Champaklal has saved INR four and a half lakh till date. Meanwhile, Nattu Kaka and Bagha manage to obtain a bag containing INR 50 lakh.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Sunita informs the Gokuldham residents that they can use their cards to pay for vegetables. Later, Sundar visits Jethalal and says that he wants to pay back his money.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Jethalal informs his friends in Gokuldham that he has INR 50 lakh in his bag and later goes to Manoj for help in depositing the cash due to demonetisation.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Jethalal meets Chandrakant and informs him that he has received INR 50 lakh from Manoj. Chandrakant suggests that he keep all the notes in his house.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Champaklal suggests to the residents of Gokuldham that they help the people waiting outside ATMs. Jethalal dearly wishes to return the INR 50 lakh to Manoj.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: The police see Jethalal carrying INR 50 lakh in his bag and place him under arrest. Daya gets worried when Jethalal does not come home and speaks to Champaklal.
